name: Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections
name_original: Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections
description:
Bandai Namco has unveiled Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections, which combines key Naruto and Sasuke story points from the main four games in the series in an updated way.

Players will be treated to an entirely new storyline. Also, CyberConnect2 studio, which is responsible for the creation of the project, will add new characters in addition to the existing 124. The first will be Asura and Indra.
